text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hmm~. My skin just isn't getting back to normal~. What should I do~...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Alright, in times like these... consult the strategist! I'll call Mom!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, Mom? Hey, how's it going. Yeah yeah, I'm doing fine. So, actually, about my skin—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Yeah yeah, I'm doing my homework properly, and studying hard too~. So anyway, my skin—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: —Okay okay~. You stay healthy too, Mom. Say hi to everyone for me. Bye.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
—Wait, huh!?
I didn't even get to the important consultation!?
Matikanetannhauser seems to be struggling to find an effective skincare method—
